information: COBEPLAST - CRI trades in off-grade petrochemical products, PE, PP, PS and PVC. We recycle industrial plastic waste. Sale & purchase of plastic materials, granules, regenerated, crushed, films and blocks. We have a large number of containers and our own vehicle fleet to ensure that we provide our suppliers with the best possible service. We offer numerous crushed and ground products, on reels, in bales. If you are looking for raw materials, contact us.
